Title: Bucket Connect 1.0.3
Summary:
- New like feature. Congratulate your friends for reaching thier goals by liking their events.
- Minor bug fixes.

Title: Bucket Connect 1.0.4
Summary:
- Ability to block users added
- Privacy Policy added to settings.

Title: Bucket Connect 1.1.0
Summary:
- Navigation bar added to allow for quicker transitions between screens.
- Added the ability to create multiple lists, each with their own covers.
- Added the ability to see progress on each list
- Added ideas function, allowing users to create, share and download user submitted lists
- Total progress can be seen in the account page
- Added achievements page
- Settings page added, providing the functionality to view blocked users, view the privacy policy, logout of the account or delete the current account
- Minor bug fixes

Title: Bucket Connect 1.1.1
Summary:
- Added functionality to report issues
- Minor bug fixes

Title: Bucket Connect 1.1.2
Summary:
- List view and photo view features added to lists
- Download counter for ideas fixed
- Limit of lists adjusted
- Major bug fixes

Title: Bucket Connect 1.1.3
Summary:
- Search bar implemented into ideas page
- Improved loading, downloading and deleting times
- Minor bug fixes
